string.name: router_back
string.value: Click a subwindow to return to the previous page through the router.

string.name: hide_window
string.value: Click on a child window to hide the child window

string.name: navigation_jump
string.value: Click a sub-window to switch to the picture-in-picture mode through Navigation

string.name: resize_window
string.value: Click the sub-window to adjust the size of the sub-window

string.name: create_window_resize
string.value: Create a child window - click on the child window to resize it

string.name: show_sub_window
string.value: Minimize the sub-window - click the background to pull up the sub-window

string.name: sub_jump_pip
string.value: Subwindow Control Navigation - Clicking a Subwindow Switches to the Picture-in-Picture Mode

string.name: router_jump_index
string.value: Sub-window control router jump - Click the sub-window to return to the home page
